titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to improve the process for congressional consideration of international social security agreements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/20/2007--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise the process for congressional consideration of international social security agreements.
